name: blaze-kick
flavor_text: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect_text_simple: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
